SqlDefinition.SqlCommand: UPDATE emailinbox SET EmailInboxID=@@EmailInboxID@@ <%=,EmailServerUID=@@EmailServerUID@@%><%=,EmailInboxTitle=@@EmailInboxTitle@@%><%=,EmailInboxFrom=@@EmailInboxFrom@@%><%=,EmailInboxFromName=@@EmailInboxFromName@@%><%=,EmailInboxDate=@@EmailInboxDate@@%><%=,EmailInboxFilePath=@@EmailInboxFilePath@@%><%=,EmailInboxState=@@EmailInboxState@@%><%=,EmailInboxIsDel=@@EmailInboxIsDel@@%> WHERE EmailInboxID=@@EmailInboxID@@;

SELECT EmailInboxID,EmailServerUID,EmailInboxTitle,EmailInboxFrom,EmailInboxFromName,EmailInboxDate,EmailInboxFilePath,EmailInboxState,EmailInboxIsDel FROM emailinbox WHERE 1=1 <%= AND EmailInboxID=@@EmailInboxID@@%> <%= AND EmailServerUID=@@EmailServerUID@@%> <%= AND EmailInboxTitle=@@EmailInboxTitle@@%> <%= AND EmailInboxFrom=@@EmailInboxFrom@@%> <%= AND EmailInboxFromName=@@EmailInboxFromName@@%> <%= AND EmailInboxDate=@@EmailInboxDate@@%> <%= AND EmailInboxFilePath=@@EmailInboxFilePath@@%> <%= AND EmailInboxState=@@EmailInboxState@@%> <%= AND EmailInboxIsDel=@@EmailInboxIsDel@@%>;

SELECT EmailInboxID,EmailServerUID,EmailInboxTitle,EmailInboxFrom,EmailInboxFromName,EmailInboxDate,EmailInboxFilePath,EmailInboxState,EmailInboxIsDel FROM emailinbox WHERE 1=1 <%= AND EmailInboxID=@@EmailInboxID@@%> <%= AND EmailServerUID=@@EmailServerUID@@%> <%= AND EmailInboxTitle=@@EmailInboxTitle@@%> <%= AND EmailInboxFrom=@@EmailInboxFrom@@%> <%= AND EmailInboxFromName=@@EmailInboxFromName@@%> <%= AND EmailInboxDate=@@EmailInboxDate@@%> <%= AND EmailInboxFilePath=@@EmailInboxFilePath@@%> <%= AND EmailInboxState=@@EmailInboxState@@%> <%= AND EmailInboxIsDel=@@EmailInboxIsDel@@%> LIMIT <R%= @@StartIndex@@, @@SelectCount@@ %R> ; SELECT COUNT(0) AS row_count FROM emailinbox WHERE 1=1 <%= AND EmailInboxID=@@EmailInboxID@@%> <%= AND EmailServerUID=@@EmailServerUID@@%> <%= AND EmailInboxTitle=@@EmailInboxTitle@@%> <%= AND EmailInboxFrom=@@EmailInboxFrom@@%> <%= AND EmailInboxFromName=@@EmailInboxFromName@@%> <%= AND EmailInboxDate=@@EmailInboxDate@@%> <%= AND EmailInboxFilePath=@@EmailInboxFilePath@@%> <%= AND EmailInboxState=@@EmailInboxState@@%> <%= AND EmailInboxIsDel=@@EmailInboxIsDel@@%>;
